snippet: A quiet strength and pride were characteristics of a people who live in the northern reaches of Europe, and they brought it with them as they stood tall between the posts.
abstract: Finland, country of 5.41 million people, has produced more NHL goalies than any other European country, according to the league; with so many quality puck stoppers in their pipeline Finns have the luxury of rolling goaltenders in the Olympics the way coaches do forward lines during a game.

byline.contributor: Lucas Aykroyd contributed reporting from Malmo, Sweden.

lead_paragraph: A quiet strength and pride were characteristics of a people who live in the northern reaches of Europe, and they brought it with them as they stood tall between the posts.

headline.main: Finnish Soul Is Reflected in Goalies
headline.print_headline: Finnish Character Is Mirrored in Its Goalies
